text: The was a civil war in Japan.Nussbaum, Louis-Frédéric. (2005). "Ōnin no Ran" in Japan encyclopedia, p. 754. It lasted 10 years, starting in 1467 and ending in 1477. Hosokawa Katsumoto and Yamana Sōzen had a conflict that grew into a war throughout the country. The Ashikaga shogunate and some daimyo in many regions of Japan fought in this war. The conflict was the beginning of a very long struggle to dominate all of Japan. ==Related pages== * Muromachi period * Ashigaru ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Wars involving Japan Category:15th-century conflicts Category:15th century in Japan Category:Civil wars involving Asia
title: Ōnin War
